attributes.additional_details: Tube drivers must be banned from striking! Tube drivers are providing a public service, They cost us and companies millions of pounds when they do strike, More often than not, over silly issues. Even more so in light of the £6000 bonus they have demanded to do a job they are already over paid to do! They shouldn't be able to hold us over a barrel when they choose.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
